bibl.title: A Testimonium to Euripides, Hypsipyle.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XX, 2258 (= Pack2 186), fr. 2 recto, 11 = CALLIMAQUE, Svsib€ou n€kh, fr. 384 Pf., 26. La scholie ad loc. est un addendum aux testimonia recueillis par: IDEM, Euripides. Hypsipyle. Text and Annotation based on a Re-examination of the Papyri = Testi e commenti. 7 (Roma, 1987). <Sosibiou nike>
bibl.seg: COCKLE Walter E.H., A Testimonium to Euripides, Hypsipyle.
